question:
####UFAQ [Michael Boggs]
Does the Runner have to choose a server for Omar’s ability when it is used or when the run on Archives is successful?
answer: The choice is not made until the relevant part of the ability resolves.

text_ruling:
What happens if the Runner uses [Omar Keung](/en/card/11043)’s ability to run R&D with [Manegarm Skunkworks](/en/card/30042) rezzed?
>[Manegarm Skunkworks](/en/card/30042) will not affect this run unless it is rezzed in the root of Archives. [Omar Keung](/en/card/11043)’s ability moves the attacked server just before step 5a, which is after the step that can meet [Manegarm Skunkworks](/en/card/30042)’s trigger condition, step 4g.
